description.en:
At last, the genius mathematician, Dr. Eli, has been found! ...but he has horns?! The journalist Hidemi would do anything to get an interview with the reclusive doctor. However, Dr. Eli seems intent on protecting his secrets…

This series has been published in Japan since 2010 which Japanese title name is "Nigeta Hitsuji no Tsukamaekata"
